content: Hello!I'm here to try and start selling some cloud accounts.From current costs, for now, can sell the following:Azure Directly applied for Pay as you go (with some age if demanded): 21 USDTKamatera on Trial: 10 USDTLinode with 100USD credits: 7.5 USDTMany others surely is possible, what you have to do is reach me via Telegram and I can give it a test and after name a price for it!No trouble at all!What you will get:Full access to email:pw (Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc) .Full details of address that has been used in the creation of the account (IP, Phone number, Address, Last 4 Digits of VCC used for application) .Payment Method can be discussed, but will accept mainly USDT and LTC.(screenshots of clouds will be uploaded soon.)If any questions need to be answered reach me out in Telegram @ https://t.me/iconiccuntFor now, this will be all! Hope everyone has a great day!NO SCAM, I GO FIRST.

comments.author: IconicCunt
